Title: Exempts a portion of poll workers' income earned on an election day from state income tax
Summary: Exempts a portion of poll workers' income earned on an election day from state income tax; requires the board of elections, in conjunction with the department of taxation and finance, to conduct a public awareness campaign to inform poll workers of such tax exemption; requires the department of taxation and finance to issue guidelines on how poll worker income should be reported on tax returns.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting a portion of poll workers' income earned on an election day from state income tax
